Text: This is the series finale.  No more Medium after this.

Thanks a ton for all the Mediums you've posted here on TPB, EZTV!!  It's been a long, fun journey with Medium, but sadly no more after this one.  Boooo CBS for screwing up a formerly good series!  Best wishes, EZTV!

Triplehammer - What a shame.  :(  We're gonna miss this show.  After CBS got their hands on this show, it went straight to the crapper!  I hope they bring this show back at some point, on a new station with writers who have the more intellect and wit than a carrot!  >:(
